text: Harris and his organic farm once upon a
time at the foot of mount forever rest
who was a village called mucuna
inhabited by an ancient tribe of dwarves
and at the top of the mountain lived in
jolly old man named Harris who owned an
organic farm Harris was hard-working
[Music]
that's not Harris I said he was
hard-working not lazy there that's
Harris a jolly and fun dwarf who loves

he never tries to cheat people and make

oh no and earthquake run for your life
